title: Atlanta area firm offering free webinar on bankruptcy
text:
For Immediate Release
Atlanta – The law firm of Coleman and Walton are pleased to announce a new webinar designed to inform potential clients on bankruptcy before filing.
Tiffany Coleman, has worked exclusively with clients on Chapters 7 and 13 bankruptcy. She is licensed to practice law in Georgia and her firm is located in the metro Atlanta area.
The economic downturn and housing collapse have left many in dire straits and facing difficult decisions. Many see filing for bankruptcy as a final option, and one that is not preferred.
“For example, many do not know that credit can rebound in a year, and the rebuilding process of reestablishing credit is not an insurmountable task. This webinar will answer this and other questions,” said Coleman.
Some may be embarrassed or scared to admit filing bankruptcy. The stigma can ripple through friends and family, so the webinars offer a degree of anonymity for those who need answers. Anyone in Georgia but outside the immediate Atlanta area can also benefit from these webinars.
“My practice is in Atlanta, but Atlanta is a very large place. Before making the drive and fighting the infamous traffic, I recommend watching the webinar. General questions can be answered,” said Coleman.
All bankruptcy cases are unique, so the information covered in the webinar is not a substitute for talking with an attorney nor should be considered to be entering into an attorney/client relationship.
Coleman offers a free initial consultation with anyone who still feels that bankruptcy is necessary. She strongly recommends watching the videos before scheduling a consultation.
Enroll now for the free bankruptcy webinar on the website http://thecwlawfirm.com/events/
